scripts.build: npm run build:plugin && npm run build:app
scripts.build:plugin: npm run rollup:plugin-specific && npm run rollup:plugin-all && npm run rollup:plugin-all-with-export
scripts.rollup:plugin-specific: cd testPlugin/module-specific && npm run build -- --umdMode='UMD-wrapped ES module'
scripts.rollup:plugin-all: cd testPlugin/module-all && npm run build -- --umdMode='UMD-wrapped ES module'
scripts.rollup:plugin-all-with-export: cd testPlugin/module-all-with-export && npm run build -- --umdMode='UMD-wrapped ES module WITH EXPORT'
scripts.build:app: npm run browserify && npm run rollup && npm run webpack
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:all && npm run browserify:all-plugin-with-export
scripts.rollup: npm run rollup:all && npm run rollup:all-plugin-specific && npm run rollup:all-plugin-all-umd && npm run rollup:all-plugin-specific-umd && npm run rollup:specific && npm run rollup:specific-plugin-all && npm run rollup:specific-plugin-all-umd && npm run rollup:specific-plugin-specific-umd
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:all && npm run webpack:all-plugin-specific && npm run webpack:all-plugin-all-umd && npm run webpack:all-plugin-specific-umd && npm run webpack:specific && npm run webpack:specific-plugin-all && npm run webpack:specific-plugin-all-umd && npm run webpack:specific-plugin-specific-umd
